title: Professional Summary
description: Motivated Information Technology student with hands-on experience in technical support, system upgrades, networking fundamentals, and enterprise-level deployments. Strong problem solver with experience supporting large IT environments at Metra, assisting with major rollouts such as Windows 11, and contributing to technology solutions projects at Zebra Technologies in an IPRO course.

title: Education
description: B.S. & M.S. in Information Technology and Management at Illinois Institute of Technology.

title: Skills
description: Technical and professional abilities developed through work experience and academic projects.

title: Windows 11 Upgrade Deployment – Metra
description: Assisted with testing, imaging, and deploying Windows 11 across departments. Ensured software compatibility, user data preservation, and successful onboarding to the new OS environment.

title: UP Cutover Support – Metra
description: Provided technical support during a major operational cutover for the UP lines. Supported device configuration, user access validation, and system readiness during the transition.

title: Zebra Technologies – IPRO Project
description: Developed IT and business-focused solutions for Zebra Technologies as part of a team-based innovation project. Contributed to research, technology recommendations, and problem-solving strategies.

title: IT Intern – Metra Commuter Rail
description: Supporting technical operations for one of Chicago's largest transportation systems. Contributing to onboarding, troubleshooting, hardware support, and enterprise-level service desk operations.

title: IT Intern – Museum of Science and Industry
description: Created SharePoint sites for staff, supported over 300 employees with Microsoft 365 tools, and assisted with onboarding and phone systems.

title: IT Intern – Chicago Public Schools
description: Set up laptops and devices for more than 3,000 students. Assisted teachers with classroom technology and troubleshooting.

title: Achievements
description: Academic accomplishments and recognition for excellence in coursework and hands-on IT work.
